page.title: 18Traffic Census is Asfordby
page.content: {SAXELBY ROAD RESULTS__________________ (For method of collecting results, time and date of census, and results of simultaneous census on Loughborough Road please refer to page 17) {SAXELBY ROAD RESULTS}_ CARS_{21 VANS_{5}LORRIES_{2}TRACTORS_{2}FIRE ENGINES_{0}AMBULANCES_{0}BICYCLES_{0} DUMPERS_{0}MOTORBIKES_{2}MILKFLOATS_{0 DUSTCARTS(REFUSE COLLECTION VEHICLES){ {0}HORSES_{10}DIGGERS_{0}COMBINE HARVESTERS_{0. Notes____Loughborough Road is the main road between Melton Mowbray and Rempstone (A6006). Loughborough Road becomes Main Street at the point where Station Lane meets the main road. Saxelby Road is the small unclassified road between Asfordby and the smaller villages of Saxelby and Wartnaby. Traffic patterns will change in the village when the by-pass is built.
